response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed with exceptional quality and functionality in mind. This item is not just a product; it's a solution tailored to enhance your daily experiences. Given its unique features and craftsmanship, we believe its value exceeds $120. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $145.
